stepAnswer: Reaction is not spontaneous at any temperature.
stepTitle:
Consider the endothermic reaction:
$$N_2$$ (g) + $$3H_2$$ (g) → $$2NH_3$$ (g)

Given:
- ΔH $$=$$ $$92.22$$ $$ rac{kJ}{mol}$$
- ΔS $$=$$ $$-198.5$$ $$ rac{J}{mol·K}$$

Calculate the temperature range in which this reaction becomes spontaneous.
choices: Reaction is not spontaneous at any temperature.
